title: Acoustic Coupler Modems
description: The introduction of acoustic coupler modems as precursors to modern modems is discussed. These 300 bod devices allowed users to connect to remote systems via telephone handsets, offering a slow but revolutionary mode of communication. The challenges of noise and slow transfer rates are highlighted as part of the early internet connectivity.
